member.summary: Gets or sets the Javascript function to be called when an item is selected. The function receives an object as a parameter containing data related to the selected item.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Javascript function to be called when an item is edited. The function receives an object as a parameter containing data related to the edited item.
member.remarks: Name of a function with given signature: 'function(editedItem, newName)' is expected here.

member.name: P:CMS.OnlineMarketing.Web.UI.ABTestVariantListing.RemoveItemCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets the Javascript function to be called when an item is removed. The function receives an object as a parameter containing data related to the removed item.
